title: Strings Attached
description: The only guarantee they have is to spend the summer together.The only promise they make—no promises.After five years away, Calla Bryson returns to her hometown of Braebeachand straight into the arms of Ash Chambers.He's the boy who once rocked her world.Now she's back, he's ready to rock her world all over again.Old feelings resurface and grow deeper. Their desires burn hot,but fate is not on their side.Ash’s band, Koolum Law, is contemplating the chance of a lifetime.On offer is a record deal, a tour across America and the band’s name echoedaround the biggest stadiums in the world.But if Ash accepts, he risks leaving Calla behind.Will he choose the music or fight to keep the girl who owns his heart and soul?Calla also has hopes and dreams but chasing them could mean saying goodbyeto the only man she’s ever loved.Can she face a future without him?Or will she give up everything to follow her Rockstar boyfriend around the globe?Strings Attached is a steamy, slow burn, new adult, second chance romance.Intended for audiences over 18 due to mature content.
author: Loriana Cappello
